full_output.summary: Self-motivated and ambitious person who a is very much adaptable in nature and has a a creative mind which leads me to finish a work with perfection.

projects.name: Hotel Booking App
projects.description: Built a hotel booking application for iOS using Swift and SwiftUI for the front- end development, leveraging Xcode as the primary development environment. Implemented CoreData for local data storage, allowing users to save and manage their bookings offline. Enhanced functionality with features such as 'search and filter hotels', 'book a room', and 'user authentication'.

projects.name: Weather detection website
projects.description: Learnt the concept of JavaScript, HTML, CSS. Used ReactJS I used the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch current weather data. Also used react hooks and modern JavaScript to build this application.

soft_skills: Friendly and adaptable to working in a team
